description:
Hello everyone, I made this button component fully auto-layout for personal use and thought about publishing it and letting others use this because I found it very useful.




You may ask what's the difference between these buttons and the others; here are some key differences:


has 7 States, 7 Styles, 4 Sizes (contain Material)

has loading animation toggle for instances.

has end state with changeable text in instances not main!

has Icon color fixer for outline icons that you swap in instances.

Also, it's almost fully responsive!




I have a tutorial for how I made this on Youtube, but it's in Persian. 


https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDcQsjT4RsBmvarzDC36Po7o3t4RA2NWV




I hope it helps.

Good luck!
